How to use blob storage from .NET

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: // Create a blob client. CloudBlobClient blobClient = storageAccount.CreateCloudBlobClient();
// Get a reference to a container named “mycontainer.” CloudBlobContainer container = blobClient.GetContainerReference("mycontainer");
